cession.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the act of giving up land, property, or rights, especially to another country after a war, or something that is given up in this way
cession.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Spanish cession of the territory in 1818
cession.translation[1].definitions[0].de: when a person, company, or country officially gives property, land, or rights to someone else
cession.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Russia was vehemently opposed to cession of the Liaodong Peninsula.
